title: 10 Years Ago Today, Final Fantasy XIV Destroyed Its World to Build a New One
description:
Ten years ago, in a cataclysmic rain of flaring energy, Final Fantasy XIV died. That’s both true in the sense that the land of Eorzea was raked with the almighty megaflare of one of Final Fantasy’s most powerful beings, the dragon Bahamut, and that developer Square Enix shut down the servers of its troubled MMORPG for…

title: Dream Team Alert: Bitcoin Magazine (Maybe) Teams Up With Fossil Fuel Giant, Shell
description:
Everybody’s two favorite extremely good and ethical industries, cryptocurrency and fossil fuels, are teaming up. Bitcoin Magazine, owned by Bitcoin Inc., announced a new partnership with Shell on Thursday. The oil and gas company reportedly signed a two-year deal, agreeing to sponsor the crypto publication’s 2023 and…

title: TikTok Silently Prepares to Launch In-App Shopping
description:

title: Satellite Sets New Relay Record for Sending Martian Messages to Earth
description:
For 19 years, the Mars Express spacecraft has orbited the Red Planet, providing breathtaking views and valuable insights of Mars. The hard-working orbiter has not only relayed its own data back to Earth, but also provided a communication line between other Martian missions and ground control.

Read more...

title: Photos and Videos Show Hurricane Nicole's Destruction in Florida
description:
Nicole made landfall on Florida’s east coast in the wee hours of Thursday morning as a category 1 hurricane, before weakening and sweeping across the whole peninsula as a tropical storm.

title: You'll Never Escape Your Cubicle Now That The Walls Can Follow You
description:

title: Sony and Toyota Are Joining Forces to Flex Japan's Semiconductor Muscles
description:
Some of Japan’s leading tech companies are joining forces as part of a $500 million push by their host government to cement Japan’s status as leader in the advanced semiconductor space.

title: Celebrate 20 Years of Spider-Man Movies With This Trip Down VFX Lane
description:

title: Looks Like We're Going to Have to Get Used to China's Crashing Rockets
description:
Less than a week after China’s Long March 5B rocket performed an uncontrolled reentry through Earth’s atmosphere, a Chinese official revealed plans to amp up the launch rate of these rocket within the next few years.

title: The Dead Friends Society Is a Beyond the Grave Slasher Story
description:
Many, many stories have been told about groups of friends banding together to defeat the forces of evil. In a way, almost all stories are about something like this. But in The Dead Friends Society, authors Peter Hall and Paul Gandersman flip that tried and true tale on its head. Not all of the friends are alive.

description:

title: Space Force Wants to Launch Satellites Faster Than Anyone Has Ever Attempted
description:
The prospect of losing critically important satellites during war has led to “Victus Nox”—a rapid response experiment in which private Space Force partners will need to launch a satellite within 24 hours of receiving the “go” order.

title: Netflix Announces Its First-Ever Livestream Comedy Event
description:

title: Open Channel: What Are Your Favorite Moments of Kevin Conroy as Batman?
description:

Conroy was best known for being Batman—not just in the iconic ‘90s Animated Series and its fellow DCAU sequels Justice League and Batman Beyond, but nearly every Batman game within the last 20 years, a theatrical movie, and very briefly in…

title: A Stone Age Cold Case: Ötzi the ‘Iceman’ Thawed and Refroze Many Times, Researchers Say
description:
In 1991, a pair of climbers encountered a human body sticking out of the ice high in the Italian alps. Though its skin was preserved—complete with tattoos—the body turned out to be 5,300-year-old remains, mummified by the frigid, dry conditions in which the man died. Now known as Ötzi, the famously well-preserved…

description:

description:

title: Kevin Conroy, the Definitive Voice of Batman, Has Died
description:
Kevin Conroy—the actor who became Batman for generations of fans when he voiced the Dark Knight in the iconic Batman: The Animated Series and Justice League cartoons, as well as a plethora of video games, including the Batman Arkham franchise—has died. He was 66.

title: Elizabeth Holmes Asks Judge to Please Be Nice to Her
description:

description:

title: Okay, Now Hayao Miyazaki Has a Grogu Figurine, What Is Happening
description:
When Studio Ghibli, the maker of acclaimed anime films like Spirited Away, Princess Mononoke, and more, tweeted the Lucasfilm logo yesterday, people lost their minds wondering what it might be. Now Ghibli has issued an even more intriguing tease, and I expect everyone will be losing their minds even harder.

title: FTX Declares Bankruptcy and Sam Bankman-Fried Resigns in Latest Crypto Blowup
description:
RIP FTX. The company announced Friday morning that they were starting Chapter 11, AKA reorganizational bankruptcy proceedings. In addition, CEO Sam Bankman-Fried’s other crypto firm, Alameda Research and Weste Realm Shires Services, which is also known as FTX.US, are also tangled up in the proceedings.

title: DeviantArt Has a Plan to Keep Its Users' Art Somewhat Safe From AI Image Generators
description:

Instead of Skynet raining fire on our heads, we have AI image generators creating a different kind of apocalypse, especially for artists who promote their work online. description:

description:

title: The Last Broadcast's Tech Horror Is Dated, But It Still Rings True
description:
